Text:
This is no DVD screen, it's theatre screen. Therefore the picture-quality is very poor.
Thanks anyway for the upload, but i guess you made a mistake. I'll wait for the real dvd version.

Idd volgens mij is er iets mis gegaan, want de kwaliteit is niet wat ik gewend ben jullie!.
Maar thx voor het uploaden van goeie kwaliteits dvd's!
This is no screener, it's a cam. Very poor quality, but hey, we're able to watch it. Wondering about all the sepia-tinted colors though - is this how it's supposed to look like??
